achievements.title: Polymath
achievements.description: Have your natural philosophers and scientists research all the technologies available to your nation.

achievements.title: Assassin!
achievements.description: Use your assassins to kill, in unlooked-for fashion, twenty men who hinder your plans.

achievements.title: Accomplished Strategist
achievements.description: Complete the main campaign game on the easy difficulty setting.

achievements.title: Strategic Genius
achievements.description: Complete the main campaign game on the hard difficulty setting.

achievements.title: Veteran Strategist
achievements.description: Complete the main campaign game on the medium difficulty setting.

achievements.title: American Hero
achievements.description: Complete the Road to Independence campaigns freeing the American colonists from British rule!

achievements.title: Master of the Americas
achievements.description: Conquer or control all the provinces and regions in the Americas at the same time.

achievements.title: Emperor of Europe
achievements.description: Subdue and hold all the provinces and regions in Europe at the same time.

achievements.title: Maharajah of the Indies
achievements.description: Have mastery over all the provinces and regions in India at the same time.

achievements.title: Affairs of Honour
achievements.description: Use your duellists to kill twenty men on the "field of honour"

achievements.title: Bloody Madman
achievements.description: Carve a bloody path to victory: kill a hundred thousand enemies!

achievements.title: Conqueror of All
achievements.description: Be hailed as a true conqueror: kill a million enemies!

achievements.title: Tyrant and Ogre
achievements.description: Bring terror to the hearts of men: kill half a million enemies!

achievements.title: Only Obeying Orders
achievements.description: Ensure that thirty missions, regardless of detail or type, are successfully brought to a conclusion.

achievements.title: Raw Recruit
achievements.description: War sir, is a terrifying experience! Take part in a multiplayer battle.

achievements.title: Drumbeat to Victory
achievements.description: Draw the sword and march onwards: complete one quick battle.

achievements.title: Whiff of Grapeshot
achievements.description: Gain some experience of combat: complete one ranked battle.

achievements.title: Blooded
achievements.description: Demonstrate your sense of duty and honour: complete ten multi-player battles.

achievements.title: l337 Guard
achievements.description: Achieve victory in ten multiplayer battles, cutting a bloody path to greatness through your enemies' plans.

achievements.title: Grand Tactician
achievements.description: Win ten classic multi-player battles.

achievements.title: Command of the Ocean
achievements.description: As a commanding admiral, win ten multi-player naval battles.

achievements.title: Into the Breach!
achievements.description: Attack! Attack! Attack! Win ten multi-player siege battles when commanding a besieging army.

achievements.title: The "Chevaux de Frise"
achievements.description: Defend, sir, defend! Win ten multi-player siege battles when commanding the defenders of a fortress.

achievements.title: Marshal's Baton
achievements.description: Achieve victory in fifty multiplayer battles, dashing your enemies' hopes in pieces in the process!

achievements.title: Founding Father
achievements.description: Take one region by conquest, somewhere in the world.

achievements.title: Expansionist Power
achievements.description: Capture ten regions, anywhere in the world.

achievements.title: A New Rome
achievements.description: Demonstrate outstanding ability, and capture one hundred regions.

achievements.title: "The Sea Wolf"
achievements.description: Capture 20 enemy vessels in honest, manly battle against the foe!

achievements.title: The Efforts of Others
achievements.description: Successfully steal five technologies researched by other nations.

achievements.title: Observe Diplomatic Niceties
achievements.description: Use diplomatic threats to good effect by making gains from five separate negotiations.

achievements.title: Perfidious Beast
achievements.description: Use treachery to best effect by turning against at least five allied nations and attacking them.

achievements.title: "The Great Architect"
achievements.description: Build at least one of every building available for all the playable nations.

achievements.title: Re-write the Art of War
achievements.description: Rule the entire world by dominating all provinces and trade theatres at the same time, but do so by personally taking command in every battle your armies and navies fight.

achievements.title: Conspicuous Consumption
achievements.description: Build at least one of every building available and recruit at least one of every unit - and do both for all the playable nations.

achievements.title: Holding the Fort
achievements.description: Win ten capture point multi-player battles.

achievements.title: National Hero
achievements.description: Successfully complete the main campaign game.

achievements.title: Loyal Ally
achievements.description: Loyalty can be a reward: complete a co-operative multi-player campaign.

achievements.title: Master of Strategy
achievements.description: Successfully complete the main campaign game with half of the playable nations.

achievements.title: Merchant Prince
achievements.description: Exclude all other nations from the benefits of maritime trade for one turn.

achievements.title: Masterpiece in Miniature
achievements.description: Complete all the short campaigns with all playable nations.

achievements.title: "The Recruiting Sergeant"
achievements.description: Recuit at least one of every unit available for all the playable nations.

achievements.title: Redraw the Map
achievements.description: Control all provinces and regions in the world at the same time.

achievements.title: Master of the Seven Seas
achievements.description: Blockade all of a human enemy's ports and entirely suppress his sea trade.

achievements.title: Towards the Sound of the Guns
achievements.description: Come to the aid of a friend in trouble during a multi-player campaign battle.

achievements.title: Master of the World
achievements.description: Successfully complete the main campaign game with each playable nation.
